page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We did a survey about employment in this area.Out of the men, farming is the most common job, and engineering as well.Out of the ladies who where interviewed 55 people are skilled 22 people are unskilled,37 are housewifes.The most popular places of work were Haywards Heath, Crawley, Burgess Hill,and Brighton.Most people worked out of the village and so hd to travel each day by car or public transport.Some people travel to London each day but because of a few trains, they have to leave early in the morning.The most important jobs were farmers or farm workers, Teachers or lecturers,management, public services, building engineering.Some people were self employed, and there were several retired people.Some people were unemployed.
